what_would_improve: Nothing - don't change a thing
additional_comments: Best breakfast in Detroit. Maggie knows my name, Patty knows my order. That's all I need.

what_would_improve: Maybe some new pies? But the current ones are great too
additional_comments: This place is home. Please don't turn it into one of those hipster places.

what_would_improve: Everything feels dated. Menu is boring. No avocado toast?
additional_comments: Seemed fine but nothing special. Lots of better options in the neighborhood now.

what_would_improve: Update the decor a bit. Feels stuck in time.
additional_comments: Food is solid, service is great. Just feels like it needs some love.

what_would_improve: Longer hours maybe
additional_comments: Been coming here since 2001. Luis makes the best eggs in the city.

what_would_improve: Better food, better coffee, actual atmosphere
additional_comments: Found this on Instagram, the photos made it look cooler than it is. Disappointed.

what_would_improve: Nothing really
additional_comments: Solid reliable breakfast. Exactly what I want on Saturday mornings.

what_would_improve: Online ordering would be nice. Menu could use some updates.
additional_comments: Good diner food but feels behind the times. Had to call to order takeout like it's 1995.

what_would_improve: The vibe is very 'grandma's house' - not sure if that's intentional?
additional_comments: Cheap and filling but not somewhere I'd bring friends.

what_would_improve: Nothing
additional_comments: If you change this place I'll be heartbroken. It's perfect.

what_would_improve: Better coffee. The food was fine but the coffee was weak.
additional_comments: Server was so sweet. Felt like visiting my aunt. But the actual food was just okay.

what_would_improve: Could use a refresh but don't go crazy
additional_comments: Been coming for 10 years. It's changed a bit but still feels like home.

what_would_improve: Don't change anything please
additional_comments: Heard rumors about a rebrand. Please no. This place is special because it ISN'T trendy.

what_would_improve: Literally everything? It's giving 'abandoned time capsule'
additional_comments: My grandparents would love it here lol. Not for me though.

what_would_improve: Accept Apple Pay?
additional_comments: Great value, friendly service. A bit dated but that's part of the charm.

what_would_improve: Nothing
additional_comments: I come here to see Patty and the gang. The food is great but the people are why I stay.

what_would_improve: Online presence, modern payment options, healthier options
additional_comments: Functional but forgettable. Hard to justify when there are trendier spots nearby.

what_would_improve: I thought I'd hate it but it's kind of cool? Very authentic.
additional_comments: Came in ironically, left genuinely charmed. Like stepping back in time but in a good way.

what_would_improve: Maybe a website that works?
additional_comments: Love this place. Just wish I could order online for pickup.

what_would_improve: Menu is limited. Would love more options.
additional_comments: Good for what it is but 'what it is' is pretty basic.

what_would_improve: Didn't expect much but the pie was incredible. Highlight that more!
additional_comments: Friend dragged me here. The pie alone is worth coming back for.

what_would_improve: Nothing
additional_comments: Perfect the way it is. Maggie built something special.

what_would_improve: The aesthetic. It's not Instagram-worthy at all.
additional_comments: Came for content, left with nothing to post. Food was fine I guess.

what_would_improve: Nothing - the 'dated' vibe is the point!
additional_comments: Love that it feels unchanged. Like visiting the past. Don't modernize!

what_would_improve: Everything needs updating. Felt like eating in a nursing home.
additional_comments: Yikes. How is this place still open? So depressing.

what_would_improve: Nothing
additional_comments: This is my third place. Don't take it away from me.

what_would_improve: Maybe some healthier sides? Fruit instead of just hash browns.
additional_comments: Bring the kids here. They love the milkshakes. We love the prices.

what_would_improve: Hard to say. It's charming but also feels neglected.
additional_comments: On the fence. Could be cool if they leaned into the vintage thing intentionally.

what_would_improve: Nothing
additional_comments: Luis should teach cooking classes. His scrambled eggs are art.

what_would_improve: The decor needs help. Felt sad eating there.
additional_comments: Food: 4 stars. Atmosphere: 2 stars. Overall: meh.

what_would_improve: Maybe a small refresh?
additional_comments: Brought my kids here - I used to come with MY parents. Bittersweet.

what_would_improve: Literally just better lighting would help a lot
additional_comments: Not my usual scene but I respect it. Authentic as hell.

what_would_improve: Outlive me please
additional_comments: When I die, scatter my ashes at the counter. Kidding. Mostly.

what_would_improve: Close and reopen as something else
additional_comments: Sorry but this is a relic. Put it out of its misery.

what_would_improve: Nothing
additional_comments: Exactly the same every time. That's the point. That's the magic.
